content: pretty maids all in a row scarf by suzy daisy boo creations *disclaimer* pattern copyright © daisy boo creations 2018 this pattern is licensed for unlimited personal use you are strictly prohibited from reproducing or selling this pattern the pattern may not be copied in any way print or digitally in part or in full except for personal reference by purchasing this pattern you are granted a limited license to create items to be sold that are made from this pattern subject to the following conditions all items must include a credit to daisy boo creations including the pattern name and website www daisyboo net if you are unsure as to how this license affects you please contact suzy@daisyboo net this pattern is written using uk terms and us crochet terms are written in brackets along side you will find a chart pattern at the end stitches used chain - chain st - stitch sl-st - slip_stitch treble_crochet - treble_crochet u k terms double_crochet in us terms puff st - 3 treble_crochet double_crochet puff v-s - v_stitch special stitches puff - the 3 treble_crochet double_crochet puff is made in this way yarn over insert the hook into the stitch yarn over and pull through the stitch up to the height of a treble_crochet double_crochet x 3 times yarn over pull through 6 of the 7 loops on your hook yarn over pull through the remaining 2 loops v-s - the v_stitch is made in this way make a treble_crochet double_crochet chain 1 treble_crochet double_crochet all in the same stitch fan - the fan stitch is simply 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s chain 1 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s all in the same stitch materials for this pattern i used a scheepjes whirl cake in scrumptious lush you ll need a 3mm crochet hook a sewing needle and scissors pattern i have incorporated a simple edging into the pattern which we will make as we go start by chaining 69 + 3 the chain 3 is your first treble_crochet double_crochet on the first row 1 in the 4th chain from the hook make the following all in the same stitch 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s chain 1 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s now miss the next 2 chains now we will treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 63 chains you should have 3 chains remaining miss the next 2 chains and in the final chain we will make a fan 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s chain 1 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s turn 2 sl-st into the first 3 sts and sl-st into the chain space now chain 3 this will be your first st make another 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s chain 1 3 treble_crochet s double_crochet s all in the chain space now miss out the 3 sts of the fan below treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 2 sts if you are unsure on this please look at the diagram for reference *chain 1 miss the next 2 sts make
